CustomField.description: This field determines if an update to a source record related to Pay Batch Event or Payee Leave Rule reverts the Pay Batch status and Payee Pay Batch record status to Uncalculated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field determines if an update to a source record related to Pay Batch Event or Payee Leave Rule reverts the Pay Batch status and Payee Pay Batch record status to Uncalculated.
CustomField.label: Source Update Pay Batch
